sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Persian: جنگ جنگی برای عدالت تمام شد - خیلی به فقر مقامات.
backtrans: The war war for justice ended - so much to the poverty of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Persian: تصمیم رژیم، دستور کار اساسی را مطرح می کند.
backtrans: The regime's decision poses a basic agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Persian: جامعه بیش از گذر از اصلاحات بسیار مورد نیاز مضطرب بود.
backtrans: The community was more anxious than passing through the very necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Persian: تانک فکر یک مقاله را منتشر کرد که عذرخواهی خود را از مجازات اعدام اعلام کرد.
backtrans: The tank published an article that announced its apology from the death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Persian: اویت از اعتبار تقاضا باقی مانده بود
backtrans: Utit was left out of demand credit

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Persian: رییس جمهور، وزرای خود را به عنوان حمایت از اپوزیسیون اصلی از طرح اقتصادی خود به دست آورد، در مورد دست و پنجه نرم بود.
backtrans: The president gained its ministers as supporting the main opposition of its economic plan, about buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Persian: رأی دهندگان برای دیدن این لایحه گذشت.
backtrans: Voters passed to see the bill.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Persian: روایت گفتمان وکیل هیئت منصفه را به عهده گرفت.
backtrans: The narrative of the Jury's lawyer discourse.

Persian: دادگاه او خشونت را اعطا کرد!

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Persian: بلوک اتحادیه اروپا مخالف اعمال احتمالی اقدامات ضد انقباض است.
backtrans: The EU block opposes the possible actions of anti-contraction measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Persian: یک ستوی پرطرفدار توسط مشاور Sly تحویل داده شد.
backtrans: A popular stake was delivered by the Sly Consultant.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Persian: آژانس بزرگ اقتصاد تصمیم گرفت تا بازپرداخت را به دست آورد!
backtrans: The Great Economy Agency decided to get a refund!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Persian: اعضای جنبش انقلابی ضد تئوکراتیک، همسالان را در قدرت گرفتند!
backtrans: Members of the antiocratic revolutionary movement took peers in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Persian: خائنان ناامید کننده تصمیم گرفتند با استعمارگران مبارزه کنند.
backtrans: The hopeless traitors decided to fight colonialists.
